options.name: Apprentice Biosculptor
options.description: You have learned the fundamentals of biological implantation and grafting. Gain +1 skill with biosculpting.

options.name: Action : Clean Cut
options.description: You make a precise attack with a slashing weapon, targeting vital points. If at least 1 die hits and deals damage, the target has -2 to their highest mitigation type until the end of your next turn.

options.name: Reaction : Biological Insight
options.description: When you are targeted by a natural weapon attack (claw, bite, tail, etc.), you predict the strike based on your knowledge of creature physiology. Roll a single biosculpting die and add it to your defense check.

options.name: Biomaxing
options.description: Your understanding of biology allows you to optimize your own physical form. Gain +1 skill with endurance and +2 maximum health.

options.name: Spore Cultivation
options.description: You have learned to harvest and cultivate fungal spores. Gain +1 skill with wildcraft. During a full rest with appropriate materials, you can craft two sporecraft recipes instead of one.

options.name: Adaptive Grafting
options.description: You can modify body parts to fit recipients of different sizes. Gain +1 skill with coordination. You can use body parts from creatures one size larger or smaller than the recipient.

options.name: Skilled Biosculptor
options.description: Your biosculpting skills have reached professional levels. Gain +1 skill with biosculpting. When making biosculpting checks, any roll under a 4 becomes a 3.

options.name: Delayed Cultivation
options.description: You can program spores to activate on a delay. Gain +1 skill with logic. When crafting spores, you can set them to release after a delay of 1 minute, 1 hour, or 1 day instead of immediately upon deployment.

options.name: Enhanced Integration
options.description: You refine your implants to reduce their burden on the body. Gain +1 skill with medicine. Implants you create have their pain penalty and health penalty each reduced by 1 (to a minimum of 0).

options.name: Legendary Biosculptor
options.description: You have achieved mastery over the art of biosculpting. Gain +1 talent and +1 skill with biosculpting. When making biosculpting checks, any roll under a 6 becomes a 5.
